Title: Relates to the operator of a vehicle overtaking a bicycle from behind; not less than three feet distance
Summary: Relates to the operator of a vehicle overtaking a bicycle from behind; not less than three feet distance.
LawCode: Amd ยง1122-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to operators of a vehicle overtaking a bicycle from behind
